name: WiDS Ljubljana - Women in Data Science by Stanford University
description:
The Women in Data Science (WiDS) events aim to inspire and educate data scientists worldwide, regardless of gender, and to support women in the field. This technical conference provides an opportunity to hear about the latest data science related research and applications in a number of domains, and connect with others in the field.


Women in Data Science [WiDS] started as a conference at Stanford in November 2015. Today, WiDS includes a global conference with 150+ regional events all around the globe, which feature outstanding women doing outstanding work in the field of data science.
